about.description: I'm 23 years old, I live in Toulouse and I work as a software engineer at Capgemini.

my_projects.name: File-Sync
my_projects.description: Share files (images, videos, text, markdown ...) in real time from one device to another

my_projects.name: Super-Store

my_projects.name: Weather-App

my_projects.name: Todo-List
my_projects.description: Mobile application for managing shared tasks with multiple users in real time
